channel.title: My Music
channel.description:
I thought I'd post some of my music here. Already posted one of them in the show of your latest topic, but I thought a seperate topic'd be better.
Anyway, they're not at all Half-Life like. They're mostly inspired by Final Fantasy. I'd apreciate if you'd give em a listen and maybe give some feedback too (:
[b]The Grand Assault[/b]: [i]A battle song I'd imagine playing in a large scale battle of sorts. I'm proud of this one.[/i] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wysp_N1k1UA&feature=channel&fmt=18[/url]
[b]Beast in the Clouds[/b]: [i]A rather heavy, omnious battle song.[/i] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e8OQV2aEql0&feature=channel&fmt=18[/url]

item.title: My Music
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
Neon Impulse:

the grand assault is absolutely beautiful, it’s in my favorites!

Thanks man! Much apreciated

item.title: My Music
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
mattemuse:

What are you using for a sequencer? The tune is nice but the sounds are kind of General Midi - ish.

Yeah I use Edirol Orchestra. It is a synthesizer.
Sample based orchestra’s are better, but they can easily take up 30gb and that’s a bit much. Plus they’re much CPU and memory consuming. While Edirol is only 100mb, and my i7 has no trouble running it whatsoever. So though sample based sounds better, I prefer this.

Read full topic

item.title: My Music
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
I thought I’d post some of my music here. Already posted one of them in the show of your latest topic, but I thought a seperate topic’d be better.

Anyway, they’re not at all Half-Life like. They’re mostly inspired by Final Fantasy.
I’d apreciate if you’d give em a listen and maybe give some feedback too (:

The Grand Assault: A battle song I’d imagine playing in a large scale battle of sorts. I’m proud of this one.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wysp_N1k1UA&feature=channel&fmt=18

Beast in the Clouds: A rather heavy, omnious battle song.
